name: One-Stick Shooter!
description:
Move or shoot. You can do only one!

---How to Play---

  • O: That's you. There's only one you :)
    You can use only one stick. You shoot when you don't move. However, your fire rate will quickly drop. Keep moving to cool your gun down.
  • Z: Zombies. They move slow and predictably, but they make up for it with numbers.
  • V: Vampires. You can't hit them directly. Aim for the heart.
  • W: Wolfs. They move FAST straight at you, when you stay still.
  • C: Centaurs. They can resist serious damage, and you can only shoot them from behind.

---Controls---

  • Gamepad (PS4, Xbox) Recommended !
    Left Stick/Right Stick/D-Pad/Buttons
  • Keyboard
    WASD/Arrow Keys

---Tech---

  • Unity
  • InControl

---Assets---

  • Joystix Font

Developed by CerosWare for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2019 Game Jam.

(PS: You could say I made a game with zombies in it ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ )
